Text:
Seriously! Cid disappeared again without saying
a word...!

He promised we'd return home together during our
next vacation... Honestly, this is unforgivableâ€•
Ack...!

...It's happening again. Lately, my left hand has
been aching...

At this rate, I might make Cid worry. Worse, I could
hurt him...

*sigh* Does this mean I should avoid Cid until I
understand what's going on with my hand?
...No, Cid needs me! Avoiding him isn't an option!

That's why there's no issue with me looking into
where my brother went! And checking on the
girls who get close to himâ€•
...Wait, what's this?
A black...mask?

Thank you for the report. We'll keep an eye on the
situation in Oriana for now. More importantlyâ€•
Right, regarding Master Shadow's whereabouts.

It's been several days since he was swallowed into
the "Black Rose"... If he never returnsâ€•
No, he will definitely return.

Shadow has always exceeded our expectations.
This time will be no different.
...We know that better than anyone, right?
Lady Alpha...
Yes, I apologize for my careless words.

So long as we're allocating personnel towards
searching for him, the rest of us will need to
work harder than usual. Let's do what we can
for now.
Yes, ma'am.
What we can do for now... Understood.

Our task at hand is eliminating the remnants of the
Cult hiding in Oriana. The ringleader is a man named
Maximilian...but he's quite cautious, rarely appearing
in public.

Oriana remains in danger so long as we don't defeat
him... If only we could somehow make contact.
I have some intel regarding that matter.
Please share it.

There is an upcoming masquerade ball at the mansion
of an aristocrat affiliated with the Cult. No. 666,
you're familiar with the event, aren't you?
Y-Yes...but I didn't know the Cult was involved...

Just goes to show how deeply rooted the Cult is all
across the world... Continue, Nu.

There's a possibility that Maximilian himself will
show up at this masquerade ball... At least that's
what I've heard.

No doubt it's some kind of trap, but we can't miss
this opportunity.

Indeed, who knows when we'll have another chance...
Nu, can I leave this matter to you?
Very well. I'll begin preparations.
O-Oh...! May I add something?
What is it?

Instead of an invitation, this party requires
certain masks.

They come in pairs and are meaningless without a
complete set.

Furthermore, these masks are distributed only to a
limited number of aristocrats in Oriana. I have one,
but...
...Is there something you're struggling to say?

(There's no way I can say...that I gave the other
mask to Cid...)

(If I were to tell the truth, that would involve him
in all this... I absolutely can't let that happen...!)

No, my apologies. You see, I've misplaced the other
mask...

...I understand. The timing has been quite hectic,
so it's understandable.

No. 666, you can leave now. Hand over the mask you
have to Nu.
Understood!

Heheh... Lambda never taught her how to lie,
it seems.

The other mask is with Cid. Retrieve it from his
dorm.

So, her story about the misplaced mask was a lie.
Are you okay with that, Lady Alpha?

Yes. She's just trying to protect Cid in her own
way.
If you say so, Lady Alpha...

While you're at it, keep an eye on Claire's
movements as well.

Noâ€•more precisely, I should say Claire and her
"alter ego."
Understood.

I'll also be cautious of Aurora the Calamity Witch
that lurks within Lady Claire...
